Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an invalid value is used to
        set the tls_cipher_suites configuration property.
        """
c = config.KmipServerConfig()
c._logger = mock.MagicMock()
args = 1,
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.ConfigurationError,
    'The TLS cipher suites must be a set of strings representing cipher suite names.'
    , c._set_tls_cipher_suites, *args)
